comment.author: 23284950@N00
comment._content: It's probably closer to 1913 or 1914, given the aircraft in the background.

comment.author: 18571932@N03
comment._content: Alfonso XIII borned in 1886 so in 1908 he was 22 years old. If you compare the face here with others I think this photo is older, arround 1913 or older. See the moustache, it is of a more mature man. The photo was made out of Spain, probably France or Germany. Could be Uk too.

comment.author: 35257886@N02
comment._content: Es el Rey Alfonso XIII, parece en el aeródromo de Cuatro Vientos, en Madrid.
